recipe.line: Gather all of your equipment and ingredients.
Slice 1 inch ginger into large thin slices.
Measure out 1/2 cup canola oil and 2 tbsp sesame oil into a small bowl.
Measure out 1 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp chayanne pepper, 2 tbsp crushed red pepper flakes, 1/2 tbsp salt into a separate small bowl.
